FILE
  COMPILATION_UNIT
    Class Point
      ANNOTATION_LIST
        STRING_LITERAL
          PsiElement(STRING_LITERAL)('"A point with two coordinates."')
        ANNOTATION
          IDENTIFIER
            PsiElement(LIDENTIFIER)('shared')
      Class Point
        PsiElement(CLASS_DEFINITION)('class')
        IDENTIFIER
          PsiElement(UIDENTIFIER)('Point')
        PARAMETER_LIST
          PsiElement(LPAREN)('(')
          INITIALIZER_PARAMETER
            IDENTIFIER
              PsiElement(LIDENTIFIER)('x')
          PsiElement(COMMA)(',')
          INITIALIZER_PARAMETER
            IDENTIFIER
              PsiElement(LIDENTIFIER)('y')
          PsiElement(RPAREN)(')')
        CLASS_BODY
          PsiElement(LBRACE)('{')
          PsiComment(LINE_COMMENT)('// A comment.\n')
          ATTRIBUTE_DECLARATION
            ANNOTATION_LIST
              ANNOTATION
                IDENTIFIER
                  PsiElement(LIDENTIFIER)('shared')
            ATTRIBUTE_DECLARATION
              BASE_TYPE
                IDENTIFIER
                  PsiElement(UIDENTIFIER)('Float')
              IDENTIFIER
                PsiElement(LIDENTIFIER)('x')
              PsiElement(SEMICOLON)(';')
          ATTRIBUTE_DECLARATION
            ANNOTATION_LIST
              ANNOTATION
                IDENTIFIER
                  PsiElement(LIDENTIFIER)('shared')
            ATTRIBUTE_DECLARATION
              BASE_TYPE
                IDENTIFIER
                  PsiElement(UIDENTIFIER)('Float')
              IDENTIFIER
                PsiElement(LIDENTIFIER)('y')
              PsiElement(SEMICOLON)(';')
          PsiElement(RBRACE)('}')
